a.ts(2,5): error TS2339: Property 'default' does not exist on type 'typeof import("b.d.ts")'.
a.ts(3,5): error TS2339: Property 'default' does not exist on type 'typeof import("b.d.ts")'.


==== a.ts (2 errors) ====
    import Foo = require("./b");
    Foo.default.bar();
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'default' does not exist on type 'typeof import("b.d.ts")'.
    Foo.default.default.foo();
        ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2339: Property 'default' does not exist on type 'typeof import("b.d.ts")'.
==== b.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    export function foo();
    
    export function bar();
